title: Hunger of Hadar
content:
r Tips & Notes

Attack rolls on blinded enemies have advantage. But the advantage from attacking blinded enemies inside Hunger of Hadar actually gets neutralized by the disadvantage from attacking into darkness. To fully utilize the blind granted by Hunger of Hadar, some form of darkvision is recommended. That way, all attack rolls targeting the enemies inside will retain advantage. Eversight Ring negates the Blind effect
